name: aurea-eden
description: A Three.js-based framework for creating custom 3D diagramming notations.
author: Robert Waszkowski

scripts.deploy1: npm run build && mkdir -p temp-deploy && cp -r dist/* temp-deploy/ && cp index.html temp-deploy/ && cp index.js temp-deploy/ && cp favicon.ico temp-deploy/ && git branch -D gh-pages || true && git checkout --orphan gh-pages && git rm -rf . && git clean -fxd && mv temp-deploy/* . && rm -rf temp-deploy && git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy to GitHub Pages' && git push -f origin gh-pages && git checkout main
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git branch -D gh-pages || true
